data.name: Frostfur
data.text: These furbolg warrens feel unnaturally cold...

data.name: Griselda
data.text: Watch those lips, she'll kiss just about anything.

data.name: Ice Block
data.text: Your hero is Immune this turn.

data.name: Infinite Toki
data.text: One either dies a hero or mangles time enough to become a villain.

data.name: Lyris the Wild Mage
data.text: She loves fire. Her minions love that she loves fire.

data.name: Mana Gorged
data.text: Increased attack.

data.name: Next Hero: Mage Ench
data.text: Add Mage cards to your deck.

data.name: Next Hero: Mage Ench Copy
data.text: Add Mage cards to your deck.

data.name: Overclocked
data.text: Spell Damage +2.

data.name: Polymorph
data.text: This minion has been transformed into a 1/1 Sheep.

data.name: Power of Dalaran
data.text: Increased Spell Damage.

data.name: Power of the Kirin Tor
data.text: Your next Secret costs (0).

data.name: Primal Magic
data.text: Cost reduced.

data.name: Raw Power!
data.text: Increased stats.

data.name: Shifting
data.text: Transforming into random Mage spells.

data.name: Starstruck
data.text: Costs (1).

data.name: Tag Team Ice Block
data.text: Your hero is Immune this turn.

data.name: Bow Anomaly
data.text: At the end of each turn, deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all other minions.

data.name: Chronomancer Inara
data.text: Once she powers\nup, beware of her\nmastery of time!

data.name: Elemental Secrets
data.text: Guard your secrets and unleash elemental fury!

data.name: Evocation
data.text: Gain 5 Mana Crystals this turn only.

data.name: Forbidden Flame
data.text: Spend all your Mana. Deal that much damage to a minion.
data.flavor: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.

data.name: Freezing Potion
data.text: Freeze an enemy.
data.flavor: This is delicious! Oh no. BRAIN FREEEEEEEZE!

data.name: Mage
data.text: Select Mage as your next class.

data.name: Mirror Image
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Second Class: Mage
data.text: Add Mage cards to your deck.

data.name: Shifting Scroll
data.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random Mage spell.
data.flavor: Next turn, this is going to be AMAZING.

data.name: Arcane Artificer
data.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its_Cost.
data.flavor: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

data.name: Arcane Blast
data.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. This spell gets double bonus from Spell Damage.
data.flavor: Now with 100% more blast!

data.name: Arcane Missiles
data.text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
data.flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

data.name: Astral Portal
data.text: Summon a random Legendary minion.

data.name: Babbling Book
data.text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
data.flavor: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Breath of Sindragosa
data.text: Deal $2 damage to a random enemy minion and Freeze it.
data.flavor: Is it cold in here or is it just Sindragosa?

data.name: Budding Anomaly
data.text: At the end of each turn, deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to characters opposite it.

data.name: Celebrate Fire Festival
data.text: Give your minions +2/+2.

data.name: CHILL!
data.text: Freeze literally everything. Add a "Frostbite" to your opponent's hand.

data.name: Deadly Anomaly
data.text: Poisonous. At end of each turn, deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to characters opposite it.

data.name: Frozen Champion
data.text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a\nrandom Legendary minion\nto your hand.

data.name: Ice Lance
data.text: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal $4 damage instead.
data.flavor: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

data.name: Kabal Lackey
data.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret\nyou play this turn costs (0).
data.flavor: I'll tell you one thing he doesn't lack: GUMPTION.

data.name: Mage Armor
data.text: Gain 10 Armor.

data.name: Mirror Image
data.text: Summon two 0/2 minions with Taunt.
data.flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

data.name: Open the Waygate
data.text: [x]Quest: Cast 6 spells that\ndidn't start in your deck.\nReward: Time Warp.
data.flavor: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

data.name: Shield Anomaly
data.text: At the end of each turn, gain Divine Shield.

data.name: Shooting Star
data.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
data.flavor: Literally starstruck.

data.name: Summoner Anomaly
data.text: At the end of each turn, summon two 2/3 Paradoxes.

data.name: Unchained Magic
data.text: Deal $3 damage to the enemy hero for each spell in their hand.

data.name: Withering Anomaly
data.text: At the end of each turn, deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to each Hero.

data.name: Arcane Explosion
data.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
data.flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

data.name: Arcane Power
data.text: You have Spell Damage +5 this turn.

data.name: Arcanologist
data.text: Battlecry: Draw a Secret from your deck.
data.flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

data.name: Archmage Arugal
data.text: Whenever you draw a minion, add a copy of it to_your hand.
data.flavor: His worgen children call him Archmage AROO-OO-OO-OO-gal.

data.name: Archmage's Apprentice
data.text: Whenever you cast a spell, shuffle a copy of it into your deck.

data.name: Astral Rift
data.text: Add 2 random minions to your hand.
data.flavor: Let's see what's behind rift number one!

data.name: Book of Specters
data.text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any spells drawn.
data.flavor: Known throughout the land as the Spooky-nomicon.

data.name: Cavern Dreamer
data.text: At the end of your turn, add a random spell that costs (2) or less to your hand.

data.name: Celestial Emissary
data.text: Battlecry: Your next spell_this turn has Spell_Damage +2.
data.flavor: Casting with the stars.

data.name: Cult Sorcerer
data.text: [x]Spell Damage +1 After you cast a spell, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
data.flavor: No matter how many times we tell her not to, she keeps feeding C'Thun scraps under the table.

data.name: Fallen Hero
data.text: Your Hero Power deals 1 extra damage.
data.flavor: And he can't get up.

data.name: Fireblast
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $1 damage.

data.name: Fireblast
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $1 damage.

data.name: Fireblast
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $1 damage.

data.name: Fireblast Rank 2
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $2 damage.

data.name: Fireblast Rank 2
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $2 damage.

data.name: Fireblast Rank 2
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $2 damage.

data.name: Flame Geyser
data.text: Deal $2 damage.\nAdd a 1/2 Elemental to_your hand.
data.flavor: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

data.name: Flamecannon
data.text: Deal $4 damage to a random enemy minion.
data.flavor: Calling something a flamecannon really doesn't do much to distinguish it from other goblin devices.

data.name: Frostbite
data.text: Destroy all enemy minions.

data.name: Frostbolt
data.text: Deal $3 damage to a_character and Freeze it.
data.flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

data.name: Greater Ruby Spellstone
data.text: Add 3 random Mage spells to your hand.

data.name: Ice Walker
data.text: Your Hero Power also Freezes the target.
data.flavor: Ice Walker you say? He doesn't have feet!

data.name: Join Forces
data.text: Discover a card from your opponent's hand.

data.name: Lesser Ruby Spellstone
data.text: (Play 2 Elementals to_upgrade.)
data.flavor:
The final stone undid its master
Spun into wards by nameless caster
Azari wailed a savage roar
Now sealed in nether, evermore.

data.name: Mana Wyrm
data.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
data.flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

data.name: Medivh's Valet
data.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 3 damage.
data.flavor: "Magus Medivh sir, I've brought the flaming balloons, as you requested."
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Primordial Glyph
data.text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
data.flavor: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

data.name: Pyros
data.text: Deathrattle: Return this to_your hand as a 6/6 that costs (6).
data.flavor: If you strike her down, she shall become more powerful than you can possibly… well, she'll become a 6/6 anyways.

data.name: Raven Familiar
data.text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
data.flavor: Quoth the raven, 'Does yours cost more?'

data.name: Research Project
data.text: Each player draws 2_cards.
data.flavor: Abstract: Analyzing systemic applications of coldlight data sets vis-a-vis shuffle-related paradigms. Conclusion: Yay, cards!

data.name: Shatter
data.text: Destroy a Frozen minion.
data.flavor: What's cooler than being cool?

data.name: Shimmering Tempest
data.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
data.flavor: HATES being summoned for Kirin Tor party lighting.

data.name: Snap Freeze
data.text: Freeze a minion.\nIf it's already Frozen, destroy it.
data.flavor: Lick the ice block. I triple-double-dog-dare-you.

data.name: Snowchugger
data.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
data.flavor: Do the slow chant when he waddles by: "Chug! Chug! Chug!"

data.name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
data.text: Your spells cost (1) less.
data.flavor: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

data.name: Unstable Portal
data.text: Add a random minion to your hand. It costs (3) less.
data.flavor: The denizens of Azeroth have no idea how much work goes into stabilizing portals.  We spend like 30% of GDP on portal upkeep.

data.name: Anomalous Rex
data.text: Does TWO powers each turn!\nDeathrattle: You win!

data.name: Arcane Intellect
data.text: Draw 2 cards.
data.flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

data.name: Archmage's Insight
data.text: Your spells cost (0) this turn.

data.name: Black Cat
data.text: Spell Damage +1\n Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, draw a card.
data.flavor: She's so odd, you can't even.

data.name: Cinderstorm
data.text: Deal $5 damage randomly split among all enemies.
data.flavor: Forecast: "Cloudy with a chance of fireballs."

data.name: Coldwraith
data.text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, draw a card.
data.flavor: He's freezing his bones off!

data.name: Counterspell
data.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
data.flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

data.name: Doomed Apprentice
data.text: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more.
data.flavor: Jaina was never good at keeping up apprentices.

data.name: Duplicate
data.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
data.flavor: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

data.name: Effigy
data.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.
data.flavor: Burning man, brah.

data.name: Explosive Runes
data.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
data.flavor: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

data.name: Flame Wreath
data.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, deal 5 damage to all other enemies.

data.name: Flame Wreath
data.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, deal 10 damage to all other enemies.

data.name: Flamewaker
data.text: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
data.flavor: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they don’t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Forgotten Torch
data.text: Deal $3 damage. Shuffle a 'Roaring Torch' into your deck that deals 6 damage.
data.flavor: Why does a forgotten torch turn into a roaring torch with no provocation?  It's one of life's many mysteries.
data.howToGet: Unlocked by starting the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Frost Nova
data.text: Freeze all enemy minions.
data.flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

data.name: Frozen Clone
data.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, add two copies of it to_your hand.
data.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

data.name: Ice Barrier
data.text: Secret: When your\nhero is attacked,\ngain 8 Armor.
data.flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

data.name: Ice Block
data.text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
data.flavor: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

data.name: Kirin Tor Mage
data.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret\nyou play this turn costs (0).
data.flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

data.name: Mana Bind
data.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
data.flavor: Nice spell.  YOINK!

data.name: Manic Soulcaster
data.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.
data.flavor: When casting a tournament, you really have to put your soul into it!

data.name: Mirror Entity
data.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
data.flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

data.name: Mysterious Rune
data.text: Put 5 random Mage Secrets into the battlefield.

data.name: Polymorph: Boar
data.text: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.
data.flavor: It's always Huffer.

data.name: Potion of Polymorph
data.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, transform it into a\n1/1 Sheep.
data.flavor: Tastes like Baaaaananas.

data.name: Relentless March
data.text: Replace your deck with a fresh one.\nDeath does not feel fatigue

data.name: Roaring Torch
data.text: Deal $6 damage.

data.name: Simulacrum
data.text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
data.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

data.name: Soot Spewer
data.text: Spell Damage +1
data.flavor: The inventor of the goblin shredder is involved in several patent disputes with the inventor of the soot spewer.

data.name: Spellbender
data.text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
data.flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

data.name: Spellslinger
data.text: Battlecry: Add a random spell to each player's hand.
data.flavor: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?

data.name: Stargazer Luna
data.text: After you play the\nright-most card in your hand, draw a card.
data.flavor: She's Dr. Boom's right-hand mage.

data.name: Toki, Time-Tinker
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage\nto all minions and choose\na Passive Treasure.

data.name: Twilight Flamecaller
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
data.flavor: Make sure you summon a Twilight Marshmallowcaller too! Mmmm Mmm Mmm!!

data.name: Vaporize
data.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
data.flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

data.name: Volcanic Potion
data.text: Deal $2 damage to all_minions.
data.flavor: The secret ingredient in Kazakus's award-winning chili recipe.

data.name: Animated Armor
data.text: Your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.
data.flavor: Try putting it on.  Wait, let me get my camera.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Arcane Keysmith
data.text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret. Put it into the battlefield.
data.flavor: She sells all manner of keys: from A flat to G sharp.

data.name: Cone of Cold
data.text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.
data.flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

data.name: Consider the Past
data.text: Add 3 random spells from the past to your hand.

data.name: Cosmic Anomaly
data.text: Spell Damage +2
data.flavor: INGREDIENTS: STAR-STUFF, \nBLUE #1, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS.

data.name: Dalaran Aspirant
data.text: Inspire: Gain Spell Damage +1.
data.flavor: Is he aspiring or inspiring?  Make up your mind!

data.name: Demented Frostcaller
data.text: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy.
data.flavor: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'

data.name: Echo of Medivh
data.text: Put a copy of each friendly minion into your hand.
data.flavor: Medivh's echo haunts Karazhan, eternally cheating at chess and Hearthstone.

data.name: Ethereal Arcanist
data.text: If you control a Secret at_the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
data.flavor: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

data.name: Fireball
data.text: Deal $6 damage.
data.flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

data.name: Fireblast
data.text: Deal $6 damage.

data.name: Ghastly Conjurer
data.text: Battlecry: Add a 'Mirror Image' spell to your hand.
data.flavor: Wearing purple after the holidays? GHASTLY!

data.name: Goblin Blastmage
data.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
data.flavor: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

data.name: Leyline Manipulator
data.text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
data.flavor: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

data.name: Molten Reflection
data.text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
data.flavor: Dang, I'm looking pretty hot!

data.name: Polymorph
data.text: Transform a minion\ninto a 1/1 Sheep.
data.flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

data.name: Steam Surger
data.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, add a 'Flame Geyser' to your hand.
data.flavor: Explorers nicknamed him the Teapot Elemental.

data.name: Unexpected Results
data.text: [x]Summon two random\n$2-Cost minions (improved\nby Spell Damage).
data.flavor: Sometimes science is more art than science. A lot of people don’t get that.

data.name: Vex Crow
data.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random\n2-Cost minion.
data.flavor: As birds of ill omen, these crows often summon Doomsayers.

data.name: Water Elemental
data.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.

data.name: Water Elemental
data.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
data.flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

data.name: Wee Spellstopper
data.text: Adjacent minions can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
data.flavor: Bane of spellcasters and spelling bees everywhere.

data.name: Bonfire Elemental
data.text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, draw a card.
data.flavor: Next step: Marshmallow elementals.

data.name: Cabalist's Tome
data.text: Add 3 random Mage spells to your hand.
data.flavor: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!

data.name: Cryomancer
data.text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, gain +2/+2.
data.flavor: She loves Frozen. I mean who doesn't?

data.name: Curio Collector
data.text: Whenever you draw a card, gain +1/+1.
data.flavor: Experts worry that curios are a gateway to face-collecting.

data.name: Deck of Wonders
data.text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
data.flavor: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

data.name: Dragon's Breath
data.text: Deal $4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
data.flavor: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy?  It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Dragon's Fury
data.text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all_minions.
data.flavor: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

data.name: Ethereal Conjurer
data.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell.
data.flavor: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Flame Lance
data.text: Deal $8 damage to a minion.
data.flavor: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

data.name: Polymorph: ???
data.text: Choose a minion. Discover a new minion to transform it into.

data.name: Scroll of Wonder
data.text: Casts When Drawn\nCast a random spell.

data.name: Servant of Yogg-Saron
data.text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell that costs (5) or less (targets chosen randomly).
data.flavor: Yogg-Saron always likes to complain about how he has too many servants and there are too many mouths to feed.

data.name: Time Warp
data.text: Take an extra turn.

data.name: Aluneth
data.text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
data.flavor: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

data.name: Blizzard
data.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
data.flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

data.name: Coldarra Drake
data.text: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
data.flavor: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

data.name: Faceless Summoner
data.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
data.flavor: They never get the recognition they deserve.

data.name: Kabal Crystal Runner
data.text: Costs (2) less for each Secret you've played this_game.
data.flavor: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

data.name: Meteor
data.text: Deal $15 damage to a minion and $3 damage to adjacent ones.
data.flavor: When you absolutely, positively have to kill all the dinosaurs.

data.name: Meteorologist
data.text: Battlecry: For each card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
data.flavor: Some say the world will end in fire. Some say in ice. Why not BOTH?

data.name: Pyros
data.text: Deathrattle: Return this to_your hand as a 10/10 that costs (10).

data.name: Toki, Time-Tinker
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random\nLegendary minion from\nthe past to your hand.
data.flavor: Just a twist to the left, one quarter turn to the right and … oops! Well, we didn’t need that timeline anyway.

data.name: Archmage Antonidas
data.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to_your hand.
data.flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

data.name: Astromancer
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a\nrandom minion with Cost\nequal to your hand size.
data.flavor: All signs point to Antonidas.

data.name: Firelands Portal
data.text: Deal $5 damage. Summon a random\n5-Cost minion.
data.flavor: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Flame Leviathan
data.text: When you draw this, deal 2 damage to all characters.
data.flavor: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.

data.name: Flamestrike
data.text: Deal $4 damage to all enemy minions.
data.flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

data.name: Greater Arcane Missiles
data.text: Shoot three missiles at random enemies that deal $3 damage each.
data.flavor: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

data.name: Inkmaster Solia
data.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, the next spell you cast this turn costs (0).
data.flavor: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

data.name: Luna's Pocket Galaxy
data.text: Change the Cost of minions in your\ndeck to (1).
data.flavor: Luna became head of the astronomy department when her boss invented the Pocket Black Hole.

data.name: Anomalus
data.text: Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage to all minions.
data.flavor: That's short for "Anomnomnomnomalus".

data.name: Glacial Mysteries
data.text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into\nthe battlefield.
data.flavor: The secret is in the frosting.

data.name: Rhonin
data.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 copies of Arcane Missiles to your hand.
data.flavor: A masterless shamurai.

data.name: Sindragosa
data.text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/1 Frozen Champions.
data.flavor: "I recognize your effort but I think your magic still has room for improvement." - Sindragosa after taking a class on giving constructive feedback.

data.name: Dragoncaller Alanna
data.text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
data.flavor: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

data.name: Frost Lich Jaina
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.

data.name: Frost Lich Jaina
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.
data.flavor: "Arthas was a spoiled child, playing with toys he could neither control nor understand. Come into the cold. I will show you the true power of the Frozen Throne."

data.name: Pyroblast
data.text: Deal $10 damage.
data.flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.
